ЁЯПЫя╕П
Culture and Legacy

Son and successor of Pushyamitra Shunga. Before becoming king, he was the governor of Vidisha. Agnimitra is famous not for his conquests but for being the romantic hero of Kalidasa's first play, 'Malavikagnimitram'. This play narrates the love story of Agnimitra and Princess Malavika of Vidarbha, and provides important information about the Shungas.
